p: To examine the effects of AC on AMF in roots of S. canadensis and K. striata, we used a nested PCR-denaturing gradient gel electrophoresis (DGGE)-cloning-sequencing method. Each plant species was represented by three replicates. The details of the methods are described in Methods S1. The DGGE banding pattern obtained using this method was analyzed with Quantity-One software (Bio-Rad).
